creator: Mind: Astral Projection, Lucid Dreams, ESP
descriptionHtml:
Learn the life-changing skills in just a few minutes a day with the Mind. Find lessons and tools on astral projection, lucid dreaming, remote viewing, dreams, meditation, subconscious and more. Download Mind to expand your consciousness and explore your spiritual and psychic self beyond your wildest imagination!

LEARN
Learn about many different topics about the body, spirit and the Mind, with the help of our 5-minute lessons.

PRACTICE
We have a set of tools that will help you practice and improve your psychic and spiritual skills - from intuition to lucid dream and so much more!

EXPERIENCE
Keep a detailed track of all your dreams, lucid dreams, psychic visions, spiritual experiences, astral projection and more with the help of our journal and see how you improve over time.

TOOLS
* Create Your OBE Technique
* Meditation Tracker
* Habit Assistant
* Lucid Dream Reminders & Reality Checks
* ESP Trainer
* Shamanic Journey
* Daily Practice Targets
* Ideogram Drill
* Vocabulary Trainer

TRACK YOUR PROGRESS
* Daily Journal
* Detailed Stats

TOPICS
* Meditation - learn to calm your mind and body while having lucidity, a must-learn for all spiritual and psychic exploration
* Dreams - a reality created by our subconscious mind, without lucidity
* Lucid Dream - a dream in which you become aware you are dreaming
* Out-of-Body Experience - OBE, astral projection, astral travel - separating spirit from the body, while maintaining lucidity
* Extrasensory Perception - ESP, intuition, being psychic
* Remote Viewing - a scientific psychic (ESP) protocol that anyone can learn.
* Shamanic Journey - ancient spiritual practice of traveling to the spirit (or astral) world
* Psychic Healing - heal yourself and others using the mind alone
* Afterlife - what happens with our spirit at the end?
* Spirituality - non-material spirit is part of who you are
* Religion - all religions are built on the spiritual knowledge and astral projection (OBE) of their leaders

Mind is free to download and use. There are no ads. Part of the features are free forever.

Some content is only available through an optional paid subscription.
descriptionShort: Lessons & tools for lucid dreaming, astral projection and remote viewing!

appDetails.developerName: Mind: Astral Projection, Lucid Dreams, ESP

creator: Gradoid DOO
descriptionHtml:
Learn the life-changing skills in just a few minutes a day with the Mind. Find lessons and tools on astral projection, lucid dreaming, remote viewing, dreams, meditation, subconscious and more. Download Mind to expand your consciousness and explore your spiritual and psychic self beyond your wildest imagination! Join 121k+ members.

LEARN
Learn about many different topics about the body, spirit and the Mind, with the help of our 5-minute lessons.

PRACTICE
We have a set of tools that will help you practice and improve your psychic and spiritual skills - from intuition to lucid dream and so much more!

EXPERIENCE
Keep a detailed track of all your dreams, lucid dreams, psychic visions, spiritual experiences, astral projection and more with the help of our journal and see how you improve over time.

TOOLS
* Create Your OBE Technique
* Meditation Tracker
* Habit Assistant
* Lucid Dream Reminders & Reality Checks
* ESP Trainer
* Shamanic Journey
* Daily Practice Targets
* Ideogram Drill
* Vocabulary Trainer

TRACK YOUR PROGRESS
* Daily Journal
* Detailed Stats

TOPICS
* Meditation - learn to calm your mind and body while having lucidity, a must-learn for all spiritual and psychic exploration
* Dreams - a reality created by our subconscious mind, without lucidity
* Lucid Dream - a dream in which you become aware you are dreaming
* Out-of-Body Experience - OBE, astral projection, astral travel - separating spirit from the body, while maintaining lucidity
* Extrasensory Perception - ESP, intuition, being psychic
* Remote Viewing - a scientific psychic (ESP) protocol that anyone can learn.
* Shamanic Journey - ancient spiritual practice of traveling to the spirit (or astral) world
* Psychic Healing - heal yourself and others using the mind alone
* Afterlife - what happens with our spirit at the end?
* Spirituality - non-material spirit is part of who you are
* Religion - all religions are built on the spiritual knowledge and astral projection (OBE) of their leaders

Mind is free to download and use. There are no ads. Part of the features are free forever.

Some content is only available through an optional paid subscription.
descriptionShort: Wanna learn remote viewing and out-of-body experience? Takes only 5min per day.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Expanding your consciousness takes time and effort - but so does app development! We're clearing our Mind of all the bugs and reaching higher states of stability and ease of usage.

We have also added a lifetime subscription and fixed an issue with Habit Assistant not loading. Sorry for the inconvenience!

descriptionHtml:
"This app is awesome. I'm shocked at the level of knowledge entailed and what it teaches. it's almost like an answer to a prayer." - Tony

"awesome app teaches you all you need to know for going in different dimensions of state of contiousness" - Charlotte

"This app is extremely insightful and it's so straightforward and easy to understand. I have gained so much knowledge and wisdom in just the few days I have been using it and I can't wait to see what else it has to offer. If you are on a spiritual path for Enlightenment this app will answer so many questions for you and I highly recommend it." - Devin
